item.title: Guthans
item.dc:creator: @xaioxaio229 xaioxaio229
item.description:
@xaioxaio229 wrote:

Hey, Im Triing To Make My Guthans Heal, It Does The Animation Randomly, But It Wont Heal, Heres my Code
Can Some1 Tell Me What Im Doin Wrong?

I Tried This
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4726 && misc.random(6) == 1) {

				I tried This, No Errors, Did The Emote But Wont Heal	
				animation(398, EnemyY, EnemyX);
		NewHP = (playerLevel[playerHitpoints] + (hitDiff));
		if (NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints])) {
			NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
		
			}
			sendMessage("You drain the enemies health.");
			refreshSkills();

}

Also Just Tried It With Just healing 20 Instead Of The Hitdiff But Still Wont Work

			if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4726 && misc.random(6) == 1) {

					
				animation(398, EnemyY, EnemyX);
		NewHP = (playerLevel[playerHitpoints] + 20);
		if (NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints])) {
			NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
		
			}
			sendMessage("You drain the enemies health.");
			refreshSkills();

}
